title: Settings
deleteBody: You won't be able to revert this! All you settings, games and achievments will be lost... forever...
deleteReturn: Your progress are banished from this world... thanks to the gods it got "isekai'd" for one download for security
importBody: Before you continue, do you want to make a backup of current data? Poorly formatted files and/or not compatible will cause you save data being corrupted.
